Sentencas: A theoretical mathematical model is established to investigate the effect of pressure gradient on electrochemical characteristics of anode in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) running on pre-reformed methane fuel.
Titulo: The effect of pressure gradient on anode micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The model adopts micro modeling approach in which anode is treated as porous composite structure of electronic and ionic conducting particles.
Titulo: The effect of pressure gradient on anode micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It includes mass conservation, mass transfer, chemical and electrochemical reactions, and charges transfer.
Titulo: The effect of pressure gradient on anode micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Besides, the electrochemical characteristics of anode have been discussed with and without pressure gradient in the dusty-gas model.
Titulo: The effect of pressure gradient on anode micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It can be found that the pressure increases along the anode depth.
Titulo: The effect of pressure gradient on anode micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The molar fractions of fuel species are different under the consideration of pressure gradient.
Titulo: The effect of pressure gradient on anode micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results revealed by the developed model verify the point of treating a SOFC electrode as two finite layers.
Titulo: The effect of pressure gradient on anode micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Only in the reaction zone layer, the pressure gradient can obviously influence electronic and ionic current densities, electronic and ionic potentials, and anode activation overpotential.
Titulo: The effect of pressure gradient on anode micro modeling of solid oxide fuel cell
